publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-3621.2 John Farquhar Munro: The Cairngorms National Park Designation, Transitional and Consequential Provisions (Scotland) Order 2003—As an amendment to motion (S1M-3621) in the name of Ross Finnie, insert at end "but, in doing so, regrets that the Order does not include the Gaelic translation of Cairngorms National Park which is Pàirc Nàiseanta a’ Chàirn Ghuirm."
